item.title: Markov Chain Attribution
item.description: What is Attribution Modeling Attribution modeling is a task that comes up in Digital Marketing. Broadly speaking the objective of Attribution modeling is to improve assessment of various Advertising Channels in driving Marketing Objectives. Before jumping to the data analysis letâ€™s first set the context for the problem that Markov Chain Attribution modeling addresses. With this post I am aiming to cover the following:
